LanguageData.VVE_TankTrap.label: протитанковий їжак
LanguageData.VVE_TankTrap.description: A defensive fortification for stopping vehicles. Provides small amount of cover and can be walked through on foot, but is not traversable by vehicles.
LanguageData.VVE_TankTrap_Blueprint.label: протитанковий їжак (креслення)
LanguageData.VVE_TankTrap_Frame.label: протитанковий їжак (будується)
LanguageData.VVE_TankTrap_Frame.description: A defensive fortification for stopping vehicles. Provides small amount of cover and can be walked through on foot, but is not traversable by vehicles.
